sub_title: English Language Teacher specialized in higher education
summary: I have 12 years’ experience in teaching English to learners with a wide range of backgrounds, ages and levels of proficiency. I have specialized in teaching English to adults studying and working in higher education whether it be for increasing overall proficiency, improving academic skills or acquiring professional skills. I am proficient in integrating technology into my teaching and I have ample experience in course development and assessment.
